trans-unit.source: The instance context that has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: Contexte d'instance dont le traitement est terminé.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that is called when an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: Représente la méthode appelée lorsque le traitement d'un objet <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> est terminé.

trans-unit.source: Use an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> to notify the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> permet de notifier l'exécution d'[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] que le traitement d'un objet <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> est terminé.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object notifies the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> has finished its work, WCF calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> once again.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque le <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> objet notifie l’exécution qui le <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> a terminé son travail, les appels de WCF <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> à nouveau.

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: Ce cycle se poursuit jusqu'à ce que <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> retourne `true` et que le contexte soit fermé et recyclé.
